data.title: Current Job Locations
data.meta_description: NBCUniversal is a truly global company that delivers quality entertainment, news and information to a worldwide audience. We operate a range of media assets across film, television, home entertainment, news, digital, production and distribution.
data.text:
Located conveniently in the heart of the Sydney Central Business District, the NBCUniversal Sydney office is situated on the top 2 floors of a high-rise building. The facility includes a movie theatre, collaboration spaces, library, nap pods, staff cafeteria and spectacular views of Sydney harbour! It is close to public transport and the best of Sydney’s dining and nightlife and is home to Universal Pictures, Universal Networks and TV Distribution, Universal Products & Experience, Matchbox Pictures, Hayu and GolfNow. Our Melbourne office is located in Windsor, only 20 minutes from the cultural city centre, which houses Matchbox Pictures, Universal Pictures and Universal Products & Experience.

The São Paulo office is located in Vila Olimpia, known for its corporate headquarters and surrounded by skyscrapers. More than a business area, it’s also a busy shopping district. We love to talk about the nearby restaurants, as the city is a gastronomy destination. While in the office, you can meet new colleagues from different departments like Networks, Universal Parks & Resorts and E!. Then you can schedule a meeting at our Minions themed room in the mezzanine and drink an espresso on the balcony looking at the skyline.

Established in 2014, Universal China brings the theatrical, television, digital entertainment and consumer products that have earned a global reputation for quality, excellence and success to China. Located in the central urban area of Capital City Beijing, Universal China’s Beijing office is situated in the World Profit Centre in Chaoyang District. The Shanghai office stands nearby the bustling Huaihai Road in the ICC Building – one of the most magnificent office buildings in Shanghai downtown. The Hong Kong office is situated in Central Plaza, the skyscraper in Wan Chai on Hong Kong Island. Our Universal Beijing Resort team is also located in the sub-center of Capital City Beijing. This Resort features several all-new attractions along with the best Universal rides, shows and attractions from around the world – plus specially created experiences designed to reflect China’s cultural heritage.

NBCUniversal France is located in a prestigious area of Paris near the Opéra national de Paris and Galeries Lafayette. Our colleagues work in tailor-made workspaces, designed according to their needs and with amazing views of the Tour Eiffel and Sacré Coeur. We aim to make our work environment the most pleasant and inspiring place possible.

The Munich office of NBCUniversal International Distribution and Consumer Products is located in the western part of Munich on the 21st floor of Central Tower. The office in Central Tower is characterized by its round shape and predominantly spectacular views over the whole city of Munich including the mountains.

Our prestigious NBCUniversal office in the centre of Rome, located near the gorgeous Villa Borghese Park, is home to our Universal Pictures Film and Home Entertainment teams and features a screening room as well as bright open spaces. Over in the centre of Milan, design capital of the world, our recently redesigned offices host the Consumer Products team.

Based in the heart of Tokyo, our office is home to Universal Pictures Home Entertainment, Universal Products & Experiences and International TV Distribution. The Tokyo office is in the Mori Tower, the office building of Atago Green Hills, which is next to the historical Atago Hills and the Atago Shrine.

Our London offices are home to over 1,500 employees. Our corporate hub Central Saint Giles is incredibly well located close to Soho, Covent Garden and Oxford Street. Nearby are the NBC News (Holborn) and CNBC offices and news studio (City of London) as well as the offices of our Carnival Production team (famous for Downton Abbey, among many hit TV shows) and the Universal Parks and Resorts teams in Covent Garden. Also in Central London, in elegant Marylebone, are the Working Title offices – home to the team behind Mary Queen of Scots, Bridget Jones and many other incredible film and TV shows. Further east, in trendy Shoreditch, you’ll find the Monkey Kingdom team – makers of Made in Chelsea amongst many other hit UK TV shows. Wherever the teams in London may be, employees regularly gather for events on the incredible 10th floor Skyline space in Central Saint Giles overlooking the sights of London.

Universal City is the west coast headquarters of NBCUniversal and is home to more than 14,000 employees across nearly 400 acres. With its own fitness center, medical clinic, restaurants, dry cleaners, and even its very own sheriff substation and fire station, Universal City is truly a city unto its own. NBCU’s businesses expand beyond the lot with Direct-to-Consumer’s state-of-the-art offices in Playa Vista and DreamWorks’ beautiful campus in Glendale with water fountains, koi ponds and zen-like walking paths to help inspire innovation and creativity.

NBCUniversal Mexico has three work locations in beautiful Mexico City. The first is a wonderful office located in the capital of culture and traditions of the City. This office has its own movie theater, large gardens, open spaces and a unique view. This workplace is the home of Universal Pictures Film and Parks divisions. Our second office is in the heart of the metropolitan area at the intersection of two of the most important avenues in the city (Reforma and Periferico), brand new and full of collaborative spaces with natural decoration and skyline view. Here, you'll find the international and diverse teams of Consumer Products, Networks and Telemundo. The third office is our warehouse, where we store the stock used in our amazing productions.

Telemundo Center is the physical manifestation of our drive to raise the bar by being dynamic and diverse in everything we do: the way we create, produce and interact. This philosophy extends to providing employees with an environment that inspires their best work. In addition to state-of-the-art facilities, Telemundo Center offers best-in-class amenities, including meditation and yoga classes, massages, on-demand fuel delivery, dry cleaning, personal mailboxes, electric car chargers, a doctors on-demand room and a game room.

NBCUniversal Amsterdam is home to the Universal Pictures International, Universal International Studios and Universal Pictures Benelux teams. The office is located in the Houthavens, the former lumber port of the city. This historical neighborhood is now home to Amsterdam’s creative industry, housing media, entertainment, and fashion companies. The office has amazing views over the river IJ and holds a screening room, a private terrace and colorful and bright spaces filled with beautiful plants and greenery for meetings as well as places for our employees to enjoy coffees and lunch.

Rockefeller Center is the location of many of our legendary shows such as "Saturday Night Live," "The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon," "TODAY" and "Nightly News." At the heart of New York City, 30 Rock is our corporate headquarters. Even in all of the action, employees have exclusive access to rooftop gardens, relaxation spaces and perks and discounts to local retailers and world class restaurants. Not to mention a front row seat to iconic events like the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade and the Rockefeller Christmas Tree Lighting.
